arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic trio add their tributes to 'top, top fella' Joe Thompson, who has died aged 36
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic head coach Ryan Lowe was struggling to hold back his emotions as he paid tribute to former team-mate Joe Thompson, who died on Thursday aged 36.

arts.ttl: Player ratings - Shrewsbury Town v Wigan Athletic - ‘...impressive at both ends of the field...’
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic side that won 1-0 at Shrewsbury Town and delivers his report card.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic head coach reacts to 'massive' Shrewsbury Town victory - 'I told them at half-time'
arts.sum: Ryan Lowe hailed a 'massive three points' at Shrewsbury after his first victory as Wigan Athletic head coach saw them hit the magical 50-point mark.
Michael Appleton’s side knew they were down before kick-off after a point for Burton and then fell to Dale Taylor’s goal.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic make decisive move after taming Shrewsbury Town
arts.sum: Dale Taylor’s 10th goal of the season gave Wigan Athletic a 1-0 victory at Shrewsbury – and moved them seven points clear of the League One drop-zone with only four matches left to play.

arts.ttl: EFL League One & League Two LIVE: Shrewsbury's relegation confirmed
arts.sum: Twenty-three EFL League One fixtures are live with Exeter hosting Burton. Birmingham lead the table, while Shrewsbury struggle at the bottom. Updates provided by BBC.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: The 12th Man - Our panel use quotations from John Major and François de la Rochefoucauld to make their points this week!
arts.sum: Our panel of Latics experts use the words of noted philosophers François de la Rochefoucauld and John Major to make their points this week, as their side look to secure League One safety over the Easter weekend...

arts.ttl: We should never have become involved in a relegation battle - Wigan Athletic starlet
arts.sum: Luke Robinson admits Wigan Athletic's continuous toil through the season has not 'sat right' with him.

arts.ttl: Why Shrewsbury Town trip is 'must win' territory for Wigan Athletic starlet Luke Robinson
arts.sum: Luke Robinson insists the Good Friday trip to rock-bottom Shrewsbury Town is a 'must-win' for Wigan Athletic.

arts.ttl: Preview: Shrewsbury Town vs. Wigan Athletic - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's League One clash between Shrewsbury Town and Wigan Athletic, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
